segments.text: I can't believe how careless the woman is being, standing in that puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying her dishes, completely oblivious to the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children behind her, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be having a great time, completely unaware of the danger they're in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of frustration, watching the woman just stand there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just turn around and notice what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a mess, and it's really getting on my nerves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't understand how she can be so unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's happening soon, before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is just really irritating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
